attributes.action: Fast food drive through’s to print name and number plate on receipt and bag
attributes.additional_details: I want it to be mandatory for fast food restaurants to print number plates and possibly names to paper bags and receipts to identify litter
attributes.background: Push for fast food restaurants to print name and number plate of car onto receipt and food bag. Hopefully to stop the amount of litter on our grass verges.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324517
